QUERY.TITLE: Risks with Mobile Phones
QUERY.DESC: What risks and dangers are there with an increased use of mobile phones ?
QUERY.NARR: Relevant documents will describe problems that have to do with mobile phone usage . Both health risks that may have to do with mobile phone usage , such_as radiation related risks , or dangers that are incidental_to mobile phones , such_as traffic accidents caused by inattentive drivers , are relevant .
